author: lgo
msg: No need to tweak repos_rev for commit tests, repos_rev isn't used
anywhere in the verification of the commit result.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/copy_tests.py
(copy_replace, copy_replace_with_props,
force_move): remove repos_rev tweaks
* subversion/tests/cmdline/revert_tests.py
(global): Bump up the copyright year.
(revert_replacement_with_props): remove repos_rev tweaks
Patch by: Kamesh Jayachandran <kamesh@collab.net>
me
(found another location where repos_rev was tweaked)

author: jerenkrantz
msg: ra_serf: Fix up commit tests #6, #7, and #28 (find me a paper bag, please).
The rest of the function would not get called, so the out-of-date errors
were being ignored entirely.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/commit.c
(delete_entry): Only return if we have an error - not unconditionally.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: A follow-up to interaction between
r22184 (the fix for retrieval of inherited merge info) and r22119
(recording of implied merge info for copy sources), accounting for
merge info acquired during repos-to-repos copying.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tests.py
(simple_property_merges): Improve inline comments.  Change expected
out when attempting a repeated merge from a "G" notification to
nothing, reflecting the fact that a merge is no longer performed.

author: dlr
msg: * CHANGES: Merge r22187 from trunk into the 1.4.x branch.

author: dlr
msg: * CHANGES: List the bug fix for issue #2613 in the 1.4.2 section.
